description: Lists the resource associations for the specified license configuration. Resource associations need not consume licenses from a license configuration. For example, an AMI or a stopped instance might not consume a license (depending on the license rules).

parameters.name: LicenseConfigurationArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a license configuration.

nested_items.name: LicenseConfigurationAssociations
nested_items.description: Information about the associations for the license configuration.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceOwnerId
nested_items.description: ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource consuming licenses.

nested_items.name: AssociationTime
nested_items.description: Time when the license configuration was associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: AmiAssociationScope
nested_items.description: Scope of AMI associations. The possible value is cross-account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Token for the next set of results.
